Sentencas: Weak electrocatalytic activity of the La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (LSM) oxygen electrode at medium and low temperatures leads to decreasing performance both in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) mode and the solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: Herein, we design an Er0.4Bi1.6O3-delta (ESB) functionalized La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (labeled as LSM/ESB) oxygen electrode via a one-step co-synthesis modified Pechini method.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: The unique LSM/ESB with polarization resistance of only 0.029 Omega.cm(2) at 750 degrees C enables a highly enhanced rate of oxygen reduction and evolution reaction.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: The single cell with the LSM/ESB electrode achieves a maximum power density of 1.747 W cm(-2) at 750 degrees C, 2.6 times higher than that of the mechanically mixed LSM-ESB electrode (0.667 W cm(-2)).
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: In the SOEC mode, it also shows the improved performance of the LSM/ESB electrode.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the cell exhibits admirable durability of 90 h in the fuel cell mode and excellent reversibility.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: The better performance can be concluded as a better surface-active state and a tighter connection between the LSM and ESB particles of LSM/ESB via a co-synthesis process.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell

Sentencas: This work proposes a novel strategy to advance the application of the one-step modified Pechini technology for an efficient and stable oxygen electrode.
Titulo: Promoting Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability via Er0.4Bi1.6O3-δ In Situ Decorated La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Oxygen Electrode in Reversible Solid Oxide Cell
